title: Shoots — Add Select All for multi-client scheduling
description: Add a 'Select all' option to the client selection UI when scheduling shoots. Enable bulk selection so scheduling applies to all selected clients at once.
acceptanceCriteria: 'Select all' option available in client selector
Bulk selection mode toggles all clients
Scheduling applies to all selected clients
UX clearly shows how many clients are selected

steps.description: Locate client selection in schedule modal
steps.details: Find the ScheduleShootsModal component. Identify how clients are currently listed and selected (checkboxes, list items, etc.).
Add a 'Select all' checkbox at the top of the client list. When checked, set all clients to selected. When unchecked, deselect all. Handle indeterminate state when some are selected.
Ensure the schedule API call handles multiple client IDs. May need to call the API in sequence or batch. Show progress if scheduling multiple shoots.
Display 'X clients selected' count near the Select All control for clarity.

technicalNotes: Check if ScheduleShootsModal already uses a multi-select pattern — may just need the Select All toggle added
